info.task: navigate to next tab in tab list
info.title: Navigate to the next tab in a tab list in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnFirstTab
setupScript.description: sets focus on the first tab
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the first tab
testPageDocument.querySelector('#nils').focus();

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Nils Frahm' tab, navigate to the next tab.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Nils Frahm' tab, navigate to the next tab.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, exit Forms Mode to activate the Virtual Cursor by pressing Escape.

assertions.expectation: Position of tab in the tab list, 2, is conveyed
Number of tabs in the tab list, 3, is conveyed
